attributes.action: Reduce the cost of Petrol and Diesel in line with all other countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have the highest petrol & diesel prices across the world? Why do our government think we will stand by and let this happen. Boycott Esso & BP until they lower the prices!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
